body:
Adds package file for https://github.com/STEllAR-GROUP/hpx-local.

As there is no release yet, I'm not adding this as a dependency to HPX yet. At the next release HPX will get an update to use this as a dependency.

@teonnik, @albestro I've added (kept) you two as maintainers. Are you ok with that?

Note that two major options compared to HPX are "missing":
- `max_cpu_count`: because of https://github.com/STEllAR-GROUP/hpx/pull/5663 this should not be necessary by default, so I'm leaving it out for now. If there ends up being a need for it again we can add it back.
- All the `tools` variants are temporarily gone. These will need to be added back, but I will do so separately.
title: Add HPXLocal package file
